name: Fabienne's Cucumber Salad
author: Fabienne Riesen
summary: A refreshing cucumber salad with a special pistachio crunch. It gets great reviews, even from people who usually don't care for cucumbers! Very easy to prepare, and perfect for those hot summer days. If needed, extra yogurt can be added to thicken the consistency.
ingredients: ¼ cup crushed pistachios, or to taste
3 tablespoons low-fat Greek-style yogurt, or to taste
directions: Place cucumbers in a colander and sprinkle with salt
Set aside until water is drawn out of cucumbers, about 30 minutes
Pat cucumbers dry to remove excess salt
Mix cucumbers, onion, pistachios, lemon juice, lemon zest, garlic, black pepper, and cayenne pepper in a bowl; stir in yogurt
Garnish a serving bowl with lettuce leaves; pour cucumber mixture into middle of the bowl
Refrigerate for flavors to blend, at least 30 minutes
